casebody.data:
Jerry O. JERNIGAN, George J. Jernigan, Jr., and Learry L. Warren, Plaintiffs
v.
Laurastine Lee RAYFIELD and husband, James E. Rayfield, Sr., Wilma Lee Albrecht and husband, Robert Lee Albrecht, Loyde Earl Herring, and wife, Sylvia K. Herring, and Loyde Ray Herring, Javier E. Pacheco and wife, Michelle N. Pacheco, American General Finance, Inc., Wade Allen Lewis, Trustee, Cecil Lee Williford, Robert Eugerald Williford, Sue Jernigan Smith, Trustee, Defendants and
Loyde Earl Herring and wife, Sylvia K. Herring and Loyde Ray Herring, Third Party Plaintiffs
v.
Mary Ann Hill, Individually, Hill Realty and Auction Co., Inc., Charles Lee Byrd and wife, Amy P. Byrd, Third Party Defendants and
Javier E. Pacheco and wife, Michelle N. Pacheco, Third Party Plaintiffs
v.
Charles Lee Byrd and wife, Amy P. Byrd, Third Party Defendants. No. 536P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Donald E. Harrop, Jr., Dunn, for Jernigan, et al. Michael J. Reece, Smithfield, James D. Johnson, for Rayfield, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of October 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
